scripts.register-command: npm run cleanup && rollup -c -i src/registerCommand.ts && node --enable-source-maps --trace-uncaught ./dist/registerCommand.mjs
scripts.node-example: npm run cleanup && rollup -c -i src/nodeAdaptorExample.ts && node --enable-source-maps --trace-uncaught ./dist/nodeAdaptorExample.mjs
scripts.discordjs-example: npm run cleanup && rollup -c -i src/discordjsAdaptorExample.ts && node --enable-source-maps --trace-uncaught ./dist/discordjsAdaptorExample.mjs
